item.title: Jackie Chan Reenacts ‘Enter the Dragon’ at Locarno, Serenades the Audience: ‘Before a Stunt, I Go: ‘Am I Going to Die This Time?’
item.description: Jackie Chan reenacted his role in Bruce Lee’s “Enter the Dragon” at Switzerland’s Locarno Film Festival. Chan played a small part in the iconic film. In the past, he admitted Lee accidentally hi
